basics.label: Assistant Store Manager of Operations and Human Resources
basics.summary: Excellent communicator, motivator, and decision maker with strong analytical and problem solving skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks and lead them to completion. Strong public speaker

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Assistant Store Manager of Operations and Human Resources
work.summary: Oversee various operations, including payroll projections, productivity, controllable expenses, schedules, merchandising, human resources and more in relation to sales trend.
highlights: Wall Street Journal Award in Economics and Finance 2010
Kohl's Territory Finalist for Manager in Training competition 2012

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Assistant Store Manager of Apparel and Accessories
work.summary: Analyze business summary reports daily to determine growth opportunities. Partner with HR/OPS ASM to address inventory issues and implement plans to outperform LY figures. Lead store in associate development, supervision of merchandise sales, business operations, and expense management.

work.name: Delta Sigma Pi
work.summary: Educate students on budgeting, managing credit and debt, controlling credit. Coordinate community service activities with the Provincial Community Service Committee. Organized campus-wide blood drive.

awards.title: Wall Street Journal Award in Economics and Finance
Kohl's Territory Finalist for Manager in Training competition
